title: L'Ardève
text: L'Ardève (1,501 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the western <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking the <a href="Rhone">Rhone</a> valley at <a href="Leytron">Leytron</a>, in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. Although L'Ardève has a moderate elevation (it is less than 200 metres above the nearby mountain resort of <a href="Ovronnaz">Ovronnaz</a>), it has very high cliffs on its south side and its summit offers a good vantage point over the Rhone valley.
